alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Johnson; Logan (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 2:54AM CDT until May 09 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam affecting Logan, Franklin and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 363.0 feet, patrolling of McLean Bottom Levee in Logan County and Lower Hartman Levee in Johnson County begins. Flooding spreads over more than 4,000 acres in Franklin and Logan Counties. Numerous gas fields are flooded. Some agricultural lands in Johnson County also are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 361.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 362.0 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 357.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
